span.p: This COVID-19 page is reserved for messages and resources, regarding COVID-19 and the Districts messaging and resources surrounding the COVID-19 shutdown and future plans regarding Farmington Public Schools. We have launched our new "Continuity of Learning (CL)" section of our website. All messaging, resources and information regarding continuity of learning, including (CL), Social and Emotional Learning, Special Education etc. can now be found at https://www.farmington.k12.mi.us/continuity-of-learning.
